text: kids love dipping so what better way to
get them to eat their vegetables than
packing a creamy cheddar dip in their
lunchbox I base this on a pimento dip
but I took out the pimentos because it's
not the most kid-friendly ingredient but
I am using lots of cream cheese and it's
important to have the cream cheese at
room temperature you need it soft
otherwise it's gonna be hard to mix
things into it you can do this recipe by
the way in a food processor if it's
easier for you then I have mayonnaise
glop that in there this is actually a
great recipe to get your kid to help you
with because there's a lot of Smashing
and then this is just a little bit of
sweet paprika it makes it pretty adds a
little bit of flavor pinch of salt so
you want to get this fairly well mixed
before you add the orange juice because
once you add liquid it's harder to get
the cream cheese evenly mixed into the
mayonnaise can add my orange juice
orange juice makes it a little bit sweet
I know this doesn't look very beautiful
right now but it's okay after I add the
rest of the ingredients it'll look
somewhat better if you know your kid
will not touch this if it has scallions
in it you can leave them out I like them
and I so does my daughter they add just
a little bit of freshness which is
really nice you could also use herbs if
you wanted like basil or parsley and
then now I'm going to grate some cheddar
cheese this is one of those forgiving
recipes that you don't really have to
measure if it looks a little bit thick
you can add a little bit of extra orange
juice little thin add a little more
cheese and then that's it the great
thing about this is you can make it a
couple of days ahead put it in the
fridge and then when you're packing your
child's lunch you just take some put in
a little container and right in the
lunch box so now I've got everything
ready to pack my kids lunch I've got the
vegetables that I'm gonna force her to
eat with a dip some crackers breadsticks
little pita chips she loves those and
then I've got her lunchbox first thing
you have to do though is to take out all
the toys to make room for the lunch so a
little bit for my kid with the leftovers
you can just add in a little hot sauce
and you know what makes it great for
grownups too
Oh
